item.title: LIVE: Divided Supreme Court blocks religious charter schools

item.title: Small private plane crashes into San Diego neighborhood: Police
item.description: Police are responding to a small plane crash in San Diego on Thursday morning, police said in a statement on X.

item.title: Republican-led House passes Trump agenda bill by a single vote
item.description: The win for Speaker Mike Johnson comes after weeks of internal GOP wrangling.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump celebrates the passage of 'One, Big, Beautiful Bill'
item.description: President Trump celebrated the House of Representatives' passage of "THE ONE, BIG, BEAUTIFUL BILL."

item.title: Melania Trump releases audiobook of memoir created with artificial intelligence
